body.p:
The agent can be installed on the folliwing operating systems:
Windows (up from 2000 to 7 including Server editions)
Linux-based systems
FreeBSD, OpenBSD, NetBSD, DragonFlyBSD
MacOS X
Solaris, OpenSolaris, OpenIndiana
AIX
HP-UX
A list of tested plateform is avaible here: http://forge.fusioninventory.org/projects/fusioninventory-agent/wiki/Agent_supportedplateforms
